data.name: The Final Hour Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Final Hour is a captivating first person horror game with its very own story. Can you solve the mystery of the mysterious house?

Story:
As you are finally driving home after a long day at work, you drive your car off the road. In doing so, you must have been very lucky and you are uninjured. However, your car and cell phone are in a completely different situation. You now go in search of help. When you finally found a house after a long walk through a dark forest, you decided to ask the owner for help. But there is something strange about the house... .

Features:
  • Open World Horror Game
  • Atmospheric game world
.
  • Realistic graphics
  • Engaging interactive story
  • Infinite possibilities
  • Many secrets

Has your final hour come? Find out now in "The Final Hour."

data.short_description: The Final Hour is a captivating first person horror game with its very own story. Can you solve the mystery of the mysterious house? Has your final hour come? Find out now in "The Final Hour."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 1060 6GB or higher or AMD RX 580 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
